parameter.value: Greetings |PLAYERNAME|, you child of wealth and generousity. What wise decision to buy my wares.
Good bye, may Daraman bless your travels.
I am Halif Ibn Onor, known as Halif the honest.
Oh, I guess your cleverness already made the profession of the humble equipment tradesman obvious to you.
I sell shovels, picks, scythes, bags, ropes, yellow backpacks, plates, cups, scrolls, documents, parchments, watches, fishing rods and worms. Of course, I sell lightsources, too.
